publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3361 Jackie Baillie: Freedom of Dumbarton for Jackie Stewart—That the Parliament welcomes the proposal that West Dunbartonshire Council should award Dumbarton-born racing legend Sir Jackie Stewart the Freedom of Dumbarton; recognises the immense contribution that the three times world motor racing champion has made to Scottish sport, and believes that this would be a fitting tribute to a "son of the rock" and one of the world’s most famous Scots as he approaches his 70th birthday.

S3M-3361 Freedom of Dumbarton for Jackie Stewart (lodged on 2 February 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Jackson Carlaw*, Trish Godman*, Robin Harper*, Ian McKee*, Karen Whitefield*, Ken Macintosh*, Elaine Murray*, Brian Adam*, Alasdair Allan*, Stuart McMillan*, Mr Frank McAveety*

S3M-3361 Freedom of Dumbarton for Jackie Stewart (lodged on 2 February 2009) Patricia Ferguson*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Jamie McGrigor*, Ross Finnie*, Bill Kidd*, Mike Pringle*, Jim Tolson*, Mary Mulligan*, James Kelly*
S3M-3361 Freedom of Dumbarton for Jackie Stewart (lodged on 2 February 2009) Bob Doris*, Jim Hume*, Gil Paterson*, Karen Gillon*

S3M-3361 Jackie Baillie: Freedom of Dumbarton for Jackie Stewart—That the Parliament welcomes the proposal that West Dunbartonshire Council should award Dumbarton-born racing legend Sir Jackie Stewart the Freedom of Dumbarton; recognises the immense contribution that the three times world motor racing champion has made to Scottish sport, and believes that this would be a fitting tribute to a "son of the rock" and one of the world’s most famous Scots as he approaches his 70th birthday. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Jackson Carlaw, Trish Godman, Robin Harper, Ian McKee, Karen Whitefield, Ken Macintosh, Elaine Murray, Brian Adam, Alasdair Allan, Stuart McMillan, Mr Frank McAveety, Patricia Ferguson, Dr Richard Simpson, Jamie McGrigor, Ross Finnie, Bill Kidd, Mike Pringle, Jim Tolson, Mary Mulligan, James Kelly, Bob Doris, Jim Hume, Gil Paterson, Karen Gillon
S3M-3361 Freedom of Dumbarton for Jackie Stewart (lodged on 2 February 2009) Jack McConnell*
S3M-3361 Freedom of Dumbarton for Jackie Stewart (lodged on 2 February 2009) David Stewart*
S3M-3361 Freedom of Dumbarton for Jackie Stewart (lodged on 2 February 2009) Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-3361 Freedom of Dumbarton for Jackie Stewart (lodged on 2 February 2009) Hugh Henry*
